author: nflaig
content: did anyone look into how much FOCIL would change if delayed execution is introduced? it might make sense to include together with this change

author: soispoke
content: good q, I was looking into it and there might be some things we need to consider indeed: In FOCIL, attesters sometimes need to fully execute transactions to check why it wasn't included in a proposer's block. The first/naive way to approach this would be to make exceptions: Attesters only do static execution before voting, except if they need to check why an IL transaction is missing from a proposer's payload.

author: terencechain
content:
Quick update from Prysm, I've pushed a commit that implements the following:  
- Respect view deadline  
- Proposer will reorg a block that doesn't satisfy IL  
- Prune ILs from cache that are older than the current slot -2  

I haven't tested Kurtosis yet, so there may be bugs: https://github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/pull/14754/commits/80fd041c2b9ceac512386608e0f51a1383bc8137
